mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT (p_no, b_no, p_name_ko, p_name_en, p_size, p_model_no, p_release_price, p_category, p_class, p_brand) values(product_no_seq.nextval, #{b_no}, #{p_name_ko}, #{p_name_en}, #{p_size}, #{p_model_no}, #{p_release_price}, #{p_category}, 'brand', #{p_brand} )
mapper.select: select A.*,B.b_name from product A join brand_member B on A.b_no = B.b_no where b.b_no = #{b_no} order by p_no desc
mapper.update: update PRODUCT set b_no=#{b_no}, p_name_ko=#{p_name_ko}, p_name_en=#{p_name_en}, p_model_no=#{p_model_no}, p_release_price=#{p_release_price}, p_category=#{p_category} where p_no=#{p_no}
mapper.select: select p_no from PRODUCT WHERE rownum = 1 order by p_no desc
